marklogic.body: It is clear to me that the LENR field is not equals to the Rossi/Defkalion fiasco.Â  Also, I know people in this field have been placed in the same fruit basket, and suffered of the same public ridicule Cold fusion did. The seems to be turning, though, but not by convincing skeptics with theory, but by the brute force of numbers of people that seem to have actually replicated something. If they finally get through with valid results and products, it will be an epic payback for them, where they finally return to the limelight, we the public reap the benefits and critics eat crow. I myself with the skeptics, but as I said before: I'd be more than happy to help myself to a generous portion of crow, if any of these efforts turns out to be true and truly controllable. For Ensuring humanity's energetic future is such an important matter, that it's way above any ego-saving pettiness.
